description: Kalpana converts several kinds of ADCIRC outputs into vector formats.

fileInputs.name: ADCIRC File
fileInputs.description: ADCIRC output file which requires Kalpana. Maps to $_tapisExecSystemInputDir/input.nc

appArgs.name: File Name
appArgs.description: Name of staged input file. This is input.nc by default. From the perspective of the Singularity container. Flag: --filename Value: file path

appArgs.name: Variable
appArgs.description: Variable used to generate contours. For example, zeta_max for an ADCIRC maxele.63.nc file. Flag: --var Value: string

appArgs.name: Contour Levels
appArgs.description: Contour level specification, in the form min max step. Flag: --levels Value: three numbers, separated by spaces

appArgs.name: Contour Type
appArgs.description: Contour type, polyline or polygon. Flag: --conType Value: polyline or polygon

appArgs.name: Path Out
appArgs.description: Path to output, *.shp or *.gpkg. Flag: --pathOut Value: file path

appArgs.name: EPSG Out
appArgs.description: EPSG coordinate system for output, 4326 recommended. Flag: --epsgOut Value: integer

appArgs.name: Vertical Units Out
appArgs.description: Units out. Default is m. Flag: --vUnitOut Value: m or ft

appArgs.name: Vertical Units In
appArgs.description: Units in. Default is m. Flag: --vUnitIn Value: m or ft

appArgs.name: EPSG In
appArgs.description: EPSG coordinate system for input. Default is 4326. Flag: --epsgIn Value: integer

appArgs.name: Subdomain
appArgs.description: If a subdomain is desired, full path of the subdomain polygon kml or shapefile, or list of bounding box coordinates separated by spaces W N E S. Default is None. Flag: --subDomain Value: file path or four numbers, separated by spaces

appArgs.name: EPSG of Subdomain
appArgs.description: EPSG coordinate system for subdomain. Default is None. Flag: --epsgSubDom Value: integer

appArgs.name: Export Mesh
appArgs.description: Whether to save the ADCIRC mesh as a shapefile. Default is False. Flag: --exportMesh Value: True or False

appArgs.name: Mesh Name
appArgs.description: If desired, file name of the mesh shapefile. Default is None. Flag: --meshName Value: file path

appArgs.name: Datum Pickle File
appArgs.description: Full path to the pickle file with the vertical difference between datums. Default is None. Flag: --dzFile Value: file path

appArgs.name: Zero Difference
appArgs.description: For datum adjustments, threshold for using nearest neighbor interpolation to change datum, otherwise points are unchanged. Default is -20. Flag: --zeroDif Value: number

appArgs.name: Max Difference
appArgs.description: For datum adjustments, threshold to define the percentage of the dz given by the spatial interpolation to be applied. Default is -5. Flag: --maxDif Value: number

appArgs.name: Distance Threshold
appArgs.description: For datum adjustments, distance threshold for limiting the inverse distance-weighted (IDW) interpolation, otherwise points are unchanged. Default is 1. Flag: --distThreshold Value: number

appArgs.name: Kdtree Query Points
appArgs.description: Number of points to return in kdtree query. Default is 7. Flag: --k Value: integer

appArgs.name: Time Steps
appArgs.description: Timesteps to extract if the netCDF file is a time-varying ADCIRC output file, in the form t1 t2 t3 ..., if None, all are exported. Default is None. Flag: --timesteps Value: integers, separated by spaces

containerArgs.name: PWD
containerArgs.description:
Set present working directory. NOTE: Singularity does not honor Docker WORKDIR commands. NOTE 2: By default, Singularity binds the outside filesystem to the container's home directory.
Flag: --pwd
Value: file path

containerArgs.name: Writable
containerArgs.description: Allow for temporary files to be written.

schedulerOptions.name: TACC Scheduler Profile
schedulerOptions.description: Scheduler profile for HPC clusters at TACC

schedulerOptions.name: Slurm job name
schedulerOptions.description: Set the slurm job name to be identical to the Tapis job name.
